parameter.name: enableUrlRewrite
parameter.description: Whether to enable/disable URL rewrite in the response payload.

parameter.name: baseUrl
parameter.description: Optional base URL to be replaced in the response.

parameter.name: serverUrl
parameter.description: Public server URL for URL rewrite.

parameter.name: location
parameter.description: Refine a search for BodyStructure resources by identifier. Enter using the structure "[system]|[search string]".

parameter.name: morphology
parameter.description: Refine a search for BodyStructure resources by morphology.

parameter.name: patient
parameter.description: Search for BodyStructure resources for a specified patient ID. You can use "patient" or "subject" equivalently, but they cannot be used at the same time for different references.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: Search for BodyStructure resources for a specified patient ID. You can use "patient" or "subject" equivalently, but they cannot be used at the same time for different references.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: FHIR resource IDs for the desired resources. If _id is used in a search, all other parameters will be ignored.
